editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by Hill Museum Manuscript Library.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This XML file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msItem.title: Lexicon: ሎሐ - ወቀጠ
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ፩አምላክ፡ እጽሕፍ፡ ነገረ፡ ግሥ፡ በሰላመ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አሜን

msItem.title: Lexicon: የወ፡ ጎራጅ፡
msItem.incipit: የወ፡ ጎራጅ፡ ለሐወ፡ አልቀሰ፡ ለብሐወ፡ ሰራ፡

msItem.title: Probably ʾasmāt
msItem.incipit: ላሁ፡ ላህላሁ፡ አስማተ፡ አምላክ፡ ለሊሁ፡

msItem.title: Lexicon: የየ፡ ጎራጅ፡
msItem.incipit: የየ፡ ጎራጅ፡ ልህየ፡ ወዛ፡ ርህየ፡ ሽተተ፡

msItem.title: Lexicon: ኢያስተሳባሂ - አሮንሃ - ምርቃሕ - እንቆቅሆ፡
msItem.incipit: ኢያስተሳባሂ፡ የሜዳ፡ ዙሯ፡ አሚስያሂ፡ ሰላምሂ፡ ደጀ፡ ሰላም፡ ገብሮናሂ፡ የነጋሪት፡ መች፡

msItem.title: Lexicon: ሐለለ - ፈደለ extended by the unmarked -ለወ segment starting with አለወ (mistake for ሀለወ) (), and further with segments on -ሉ, -ለየ, -ሊ, -ላ, -ሌ, -ሎ
msItem.incipit: ሐለለ፡ አረረ፡ ሐመለ፡ ለቀመ፡ ሐሰለ፡ ለበበ፡ ሐቀለ፡ ምድረ፡ በዳ፡ ሆነ፡ ሐቀለ፡ ቀማ፡
msItem.note: Further meanings of the word are introduced through the repetion (cp. ሐቀለ፡).

msItem.title: Lexicon: ሐመመ - ፈጸመ extended by -መወ segment starting with ሐመወ (), -መየ segment starting with ሐመየ (), further segments for -ሙ, -ሚ, ማ-, ሜ, ም, ሞ
msItem.incipit: ሐመ፡ ታመመ፡ ሐለመ፡ አለመ፡ ሐመመ፡ ተመቀኘ፡

msItem.title: Lexicon: ሔሰ - ፈደሰ extended by -ሰወ segment starting with ሐሰወ (), -መየ segment starting with ሐሰየ (), further segments for -ሲ, ሳ-, ሴ, ስ, ሶ

incipit.hi: ሔሰ፡ ነቀፈ፡ ሐሰ፡ ነቀነቀ፡ ሐመሰ፡ ፭አደረገ፡

msItem.title: Lexicon: ሖረ - ፈጠረ extended by -ረወ segment starting with ሐረወ (), further segment for -ሩ; ረየ segment starting with ኃረየ (); segments for ሪ, ራ, ር, ሮ
msItem.incipit: ሖረ፡ ሔደ፡ ሐሥረ፡ ጐስቈለ፡ ሐረረ፡ አረረ፡ ሐብረ፡ ፩ሆነ፡ ተባበረ፡ ሐበረ፡ ፩ሆነ፡ ተባበረ፡ ሐበረ፡ ተጐናጠፈ፡

msItem.title: Lexicon: ሐልቀ - ፈሐቀ extended by -ቀወ segment starting with ነቀወ (), further segment for -ቁ; -ቀየ segment starting with ሐቀየ (); segments for ቃ, ቅ, ቆ
msItem.incipit: ሐልቀ፡ አለቀ፡ ኈለቀ፡ ቈጠረ፡ ሐብቀቀ፡ ሳለ፡ ሐብቈቈ፡ አደፈ፤
msItem.note: It is unclear where the word following the explicit should be assigned to (ሐብቀ፡ ዳ።).

msItem.title: Lexicon: ሐሰበ - ጸግበ extended by -በወ segment starting with ለበወ (), further segment for -ቡ; -በየ segment starting with ተሐበየ (); segments for ቢ, ቤ, ብ, ቦ

incipit.hi: ሐሰበ፡ አለበ፡ ሐሰበ፡ ቈጠረ፡ አሰበ፡ ሐበበ፡ አነፈሰ፡

msItem.title: Lexicon: ሐርበተ - ፈየተ extended by -ተወ segment starting with ሐተወ (), further segment for -ቱ; -ተየ segment starting with ሰትየ (); segments for ቲ, ታ, ት, ቶ
msItem.incipit: ሐርበተ፡ መከተ፡ ሐብረተ፡ ወለወለ፡ ሐተተ፡ መረመረ፡ ሐግረተ፡ ሰቀላለተ፡ ደዳ፡ ሆነ፤ መመተ፡ ሸሸ፡

incipit.hi: ሐቀነ፡ ገፍ፡ አዘነ፡ ሐይመነ፡ አሳመነ፡ ሐፀነ፡ አሳደገ፡
ሐስአ፡ በረዳ፡ ኀብአ፡ ሸሸገ፡ ኀዝአ፡ ከለከለ፡
ሆከ፡ አወከ፡ ሐከከ፡ ተከራከረ፡ ሔከ፡ አላመጠ፡

msItem.title: Lexicon: ሐበዘ - ገነዘ, extended by -ዘወ segment starting with ቤዘወ፡ (), -ዙ, -ዘየ segment starting with ሴዘየ (), -ዚ, -ዛ, -ዜ, ዝ
msItem.incipit: ሐበዘ፡ ጋገረ፡ ሐወዘ፡ አማረ፡ መሐዘ፡ ተጨወተ፡

msItem.title: Lexicon: ሐውለየ - ጻሕየየ, -ዩ segment starting with ስልንዩ (), -ያ, -ይ, -ዮ starting with ሎጋዮ፡ ግምጃ፡
msItem.incipit: ሐውለየ፡ ደግዝገዝ፡ አለ፡ ሰቀየ፡ ደገመ
msItem.note: The word ዋህየ is rubricated , for unclear reason.

msItem.title: Lexicon: ሐመገ - አንጎገወ, extended by -ገወ segment containing only the word ጸገወ (), -ጉ, -ገየ starting with ሐገየ, -ጊ, -ጋ, - ጌ, -ግ, -ጎ segments

incipit.hi: ሐመገ፡ አድፈረሰ፡ ሐደገ፡ ጣለ፡ ሐገገ፡ ሕግ፡ ሰራ፡

msItem.title: Lexicon: ሐጠ - ፈለጠ, extended by -ጠወ segment starting with መጠወ (), -ጡ, -ጠየ starting with ለጠየ, -ጢ, -ጣ, -ጤ, -ጥ, -ጦ segments

incipit.hi: ሐጠ፡ ሸነገለ፡ ሐብጠ፡ አበጠ፡ ሐፈጠ፡ ጻፈ ለበጠ፡ ለበጠ፡

msItem.title: Lexicon: ሔጰ - ቀልጰጰ, very short (three lines only), continued by -ጰወ segment starting with አጸንጰወ (), very short segments for -ጵ, -ጳ
msItem.incipit: ሔጰ፡ ነደፈ፡ ገመሰ፡ ቀልጰጰ፡ ነከሰ፡ አጸንጰወ፡

msItem.title: Lexicon: ሐረፀ - ገገጸ, continued by -ፀወ segment starting with ሐፀወ (), a very short segment for -ፁ, -ጸየ segment starting with ሐጸየ, segments for -ፂ, -ፃ, -ፄ, -ፅ, -ፆ
msItem.incipit: ሐረፀ፡ ፈጨ፡ ሐንጸጸ፡ ጸረጸረ፡

msItem.title: Lexicon: ሐለፈ - ጸረፈ, continued by -ፈወ segment starting with ሐፈወ (), a very short segment for -ፉ, -ፈየ segment starting with ሰፈየ (), segments for -ፉ, -ፊ, -ፋ, -ፌ
msItem.incipit: ሐለፈ፡ አለፈ፡ ሞተ፡ ሐቀፈ፡ አቀፈ፡ ሐደፈ፡ አስተማረ፡

msItem.title: Another part of lexicon introduced as ዘተረስዓ፡ ነባር “Overlooked nabbār-forms”, arranged according to the last letter.
Lexicon ዘተረስዓ፡ ነባር, ሁ to ሆ, with various laringeals
msItem.incipit: ዘተረስዓ፡ ነባር፡ ስምኤሁ፡ ምሳው፡ ምብሉም፤ ዝጋሔሁ፡ መቆለፍያው፡
msItem.explicit: ነስሖ፡ ማዘን፤ መመለስሂ፤ ይ፤ ኦሆ፡ በጀ፨
msItem.note: Synonims are indicated by the addition -ሂ፤ ይ፤.

msItem.title: Lexicon ዘተረስዓ፡ ነባር, ሉ to ሎ, with various laringeals
msItem.incipit: ኵሉ፡ ሁሉ፤ መሉ፡ ሰንጭድ፤ ሰድሉ፡ ግራር፤ አቀፌጥሉ፡ ሰገድ፤ መኤሉ፡ ችፍርግ፤
msItem.note: Synonims are indicated by the addition -ሂ፤ ይ፤. Plural forms are indicated with words በ፡ ብዙ፤

msItem.title: Lexicon ዘተረስዓ፡ ነባር, ቁ to ቆ
msItem.note: Synonims are indicated by the addition -ሂ፤ ይ፤. Plural forms are marked with words በ፡ ብዙ፤. In three units two words are rubricated, ማርያም፡ ብሂል፡

msItem.title: Lexicon ዘተረስዓ፡ ነባር, ሩ to ሮ
msItem.note: At the end there are many forms of the infinitive ending with -ሮ.

msItem.title: Lexicon ዘተረስዓ፡ ነባር, ቀ to ቆ
Lexicon ዘተረስዓ፡ ነባር, ቱ to ቶ
msItem.incipit: ያቀቱ፡ ይስገብራል፡ ያቅቱ፨ ያእቱ፡ ያገባል፤ ያእቱ፨
msItem.note: Synonims are indicated by the addition of the particle -ሂ፤.

msItem.title: Lexicon ዘተረስዓ፡ ነባር, ኑ
msItem.incipit: አኮኑ፡ አይዶለውም፡ ይ፡ እፎኑ፡ እንዴት፡ ነው፤
msItem.note: Synonims are indicated by the addition of the particle -ሂ፤.

msItem.title: Lexicon ዘተረስዓ፡ ነባር, forms of the verb ሰብሐ and their congjugtion and forms with object suffixes.
msItem.note: Masculine forms are marked with the abbreviation ወ in the margins, and the feminine forms with the abbreviation ሴ or ሴቶ (for plural), between red and black dashes above and below. In the upper margin of the words in Amharic "all (are) 361" may refer to the number of the forms in the section.

msItem.title: Lexicon, forms of the verbs ፈጸመ, ወገረ, ስእነ, ርእየ, ወደየ, ሀለየ, ክህለ, አርአየ, and others.
msItem.incipit: ፈጸመ፡ ጨረሰ፡ ይፌጽም፡ ይፈጽም፡ ይፈጽም፡ ፈጸምከ፡ ጨረስህ፡ ትፌጽም፡ ትፈጽም፡ ፈጽሞ፡ ፈጸሙ፡ ጨረሱ፡
msItem.explicit: መሐረ፡ አስተማረ፡ ይሜህር፡ ይምሀር፡ ይምሀር፨ መሐረ፡ መጸወተ፡ ራራ፡ ማረ፡ ይምህር፡ ይምሀር፡ ይምሀር፨

msItem.title: Thematic lexicon: ነገረ፡ ከተማ፡ ሰማይ፡, dedicated to the sky, sky bodies (the word ከተማ፡ must be a mistake) and sky phenomena,
msItem.incipit: እጽሕፍ፡ ነገረ፡ ከተማ፡ ሰማይ፡ ሰማያት፡ አርያም፡ ራማ፡ ኢዮር፡ አየር፡ ፈለክ፡ ፋሌክ፡ ጊልጌላ፡ ጥሉቃዴርጠፈር፡ ዘ፡ ሰማይ፨
msItem.note: Groups of various Gǝʿǝz words for heaven, light, stars, planets; each item is followed by a genericl Amharic noun applicable to all. The thematic exposition seems to end with ካህናተ፡ ሰማይ፡ (). On , a group of words seems to be terms for trees and plants. The groups of names are divided by the sign ፨. No rubrications.

msItem.title: Thematic lexicon: birds and anymals (starting with ዖፍ፡ ዘ፡ ዖፍ)
msItem.note: The boundary between the parts is not indicated, the rubricated introductory words are missing.

msItem.title: Thematic lexicon: trade and travel (not indicated as subpart), encompassing several subtopics (maritime trips, measures and currency, cloths, travel)
msItem.incipit: ነጋዲ፡ ነጋድያን፡ ዘ፡ ነጋዴ፤ ኖትያ፡ ኖትያት፡ ሕዳፍ፡ ዘ፡ ቀዛፊ፤

msItem.title: Thematic lexicon: ነገረ፡ መርዓዊ፡
msItem.incipit: እጽሕፍ፡ ነገረ፡ መርዓዊ፡ መርዓዊ፡ መርዓውያን፡ ዘ፡ ሙሺራ፤ መርዓት፡ መርዓውያት፡ ዘ፡ የሴት፤
msItem.note: Some nouns are privided with plural forms and feminine forms (የሴት፡); indication to plural is በብዙ፡; if the word is the same in Amharic, there is no translation but indication በቁሙ፡

msItem.title: Thematic lexicon: ነገረ፡ ገራኅት፡
msItem.incipit: እጽሕፍ፡ነገረ፡ ገራኅት፡ ገራኅት፡ ገራውህ፡ ዘ፡ እርሻ፤ ትልም፡ አትላም፡ ዘ፡ በቁሙ፤
msItem.note: Some nouns are privided with plural forms, indication to them is በብዙ፡; if the words remain the same in Amharic, there is no translation but indication በቁሙ፡

msItem.title: Thematic lexicon: ነገረ፡ ንጉሥ፡
msItem.incipit: እጽሕፍ፡ ነገረ፡ ንጉሥ፡ ነገሥት፡ ነገሥታት፡ አሕባል፡ ኃብል፡ ሰርዌ፡ ቀርን፡ መሢሕ፡ ዘ፡ ንጉሥ፤ ነገሥት፡ ነገሥታት፡ ዘ፡ እቴጌ፤

msItem.title: Thematic lexicon: ነገረ፡ ጸሐፊ፡
msItem.incipit: እጽሕፍ፡ነገረ፡ ጸሐፊ፡ ጸሐፍት፡ መዓልም፡ ዘ፡ ጻፎች፤ ቀለም፡ ቀለማት፡ ኅጐረ፡ ኒል፡ ማየ፡ ሕመት፡ ዘ፡ ቀለም፤ ብርዕ፡ አብራዕ፡ ዘ፡ ብር፤ ጠበጠበ፡ ዘ፡ አበጀጀ፤ ቀለም፡ ዘ፡ የቀለም፡ ቀንድ፤ ረቅ፡ ክርታስ፡ ለውህ፡ ስሌዳ፡ ዘ፡ ብራና፤

msItem.title: Thematic lexicon: ነገረ፡ መቅደስ፡
msItem.incipit: እጽሕፍ፡ነገረ፡ መቅደስ፡ መቅደስ፡ ዘ፡ ማመስገኛ፤

msItem.title: Proclamation ነገረ፡ አዋጅ፡
msItem.incipit: እጽሕፍ፡ነገረ፡ አዋጅ፡ ገቢርና፡ ተገብሮ፡ በምን፡ ይለያሉ፡ ቢሉ፡ ባሳሳባችው፡ ገቢር፡ ግዕዝ፡ ይስባል፡ ትገብሮ፡ ሳድስ፡ ይስባል፡ እለዚህም፡ በስምና፡ በግብር፡ እያሰ የሚሰዩባቸው፡ ቀለማት፡ ፯ናቸው፡ ግዕዝ፡ ኃምስ፡ ሳብእ፡ ገቢር፡ ናቸው፡ ካዕብ፡ ሣልስ፡ ሳድስ፡ ተገብሮ፡ ናቸው፡ ለ፫ገቢር፡ ፫ገቢር፡ ለ፫ተገብሮ፡ ፫ተገብሮ፡ ይቀጸልላቸዋል፡ ራብዑ፡ ተፈቃቃሪ፡ ነው፡ ከነዚህም፡ ስያፍና፡ ነባር፡ ቀለም፡ በተገኘ፡ ገቢር፡ በተገብሮ፡ ያስተባብራል፡

msItem.title: On ባዕድ፡ ቅጽል፡
msItem.incipit: ናሁ፡ ተወጥነ፡ ነገረ፡ ባዕድ፡ ቅጽል፡ ባዕድ፡ ቅጽል፡ እንዴት፡ ነው፡ ቢሉ፡ ሲናበብ፡ ባሌበቱን፡ ሲለደ፡ ተሳቢውን፡ ይመስላል፡ አገባቡ፡ ዘርዝሩ፡ ለባለቤት፡ አንቀጹ፡ አንቀጹ፡ ለተሳቢ፡ ሲሆን፡ ባዕድ፡ ቀጽል፡ ይባላል፡

msItem.title: Introduction: what is sawāsǝw
msItem.incipit: ናሁ፡ ወጠንኩ፡ ጸሒፈ፡ አገባብ፡ ዘሰዋስው፡ ዘይበውእ፡ በአናቅጽ፡ በቅርብ፡ በሩቅ፡ ባንድ፡ በብዙ፡ በሴት፡ በወንድ፤ ሰዋስው፡ ብሂል፡ ይላል፡ ሰዋስው፡ ብሂል፡ ተፈች፡ ብሂል፡ አስፈች፡ ማለት፡ ነው፡

msItem.title: On particles እስመ፡, በይነ፡, እንበይነ፡, በእንተ፡, ህይንተ፡, and others
On ንኡስ፡ አገባብ፡ ዘሰዋስው፡, mostly on ዲበ፡ and related words, ትሕተ፡, ውስተ፡, ወሂ፡, አይ፡
msItem.incipit: ተወጥነ፡ ንዑስ፡ አገባብ፡ ዘሰዋስው፡ መናበቢ፤ አብዳን፤ ዲበ፡ ላዕለ፤ መልዕልተ፡ በላይ፡ ሲሆ፤ ለቦታ፡ ነው፡ ነበረ፡ ብእሲ፡ ዲበ፡ መንበረ፤ ላዕለ፤ መልዕ፤ መንበ፡ ያለ፤ ነበረ፤

msItem.title: Lexocon for thematical classes of words and for various books
Lexicon for Biblical place names
msItem.incipit: እጽሕፍ፡ ነገረ፡ ሀገር፡ አኀጉር፡ ብሔር፡ በሐውርት፡ ዘ፡ ሀገር፡ አናስር፤ ዘ፤ ማዕዘነ፡ ዓለም፡

msItem.title: Lexicon for dieties
msItem.incipit: እጽሕፍ፡ ነገረ፡ አማልክት፡ ሞሎኅ፡ ጦሪት፡ ኤልሳዕ፡ ኮሞስ፡ ቴጊር፡

msItem.title: Lexicon for transgressions of Abel
msItem.incipit: እጽሕፍ፡ ነገረ፡ ግፍዕ፡ ዘአቤል፡

msItem.title: Lexicon for lamentations
msItem.incipit: እጽ፡ነገረ፤ ብካይ፡ ዘአዳም፡ ወሔዋን፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ዳዊት፡ ዘሰብአ፡ ቲቊሄ፡ ወቲያስ፤ ዘሚልክያስ፤ ዘታቦተ፤ ጽዮን፤ ዕዝራ፤ ኢርምያስ፤

msItem.title: Lexicon for bitter things
msItem.incipit: እጽሕ፡ነገረ፡ ምረር፡ ዘእጉስታር፤ ዘማየ፡ ሰማርያ፡ ዘብኂዕ፡ ሐሞት፤

msItem.title: Lexicon for lepra
msItem.incipit: እጽሕፍ፡ነገረ፡ ለምጽ፡ ዘእደ> ሙሴ፡ ዘእኅተ፡ ሙሴ፡

msItem.title: Lexicon with no further specification
msItem.incipit: እጽሕፍ፡ነገረ፡ ሰዋስው፤ ከህከ፡ ከሀ፤ ዘ፤ ወድያ፡ ምዕረ፤ ዘ፤ አንድ፤ ጊዜ፤ ሣዕሣዕ፤ ዘ፤ ቅልጥፍጥፍ፡ ያለ፤ ሀለየ፤ ዘ፤ አሰበ፤

msItem.title: Very short lexicon for 1 Chronicles (Paralipomenon)
msItem.incipit: እጽሕፍ፡ ነገረ፡ ሕፁፃን፡ ሲሩሲሮት፡ መዳፈኛ፤ ሰካዕሩር፡ ዘ፡ መጨርያ፤ ጕርዝ፡ ዘ፡ እርሻ፤

msItem.title: A lexicon for "all books"
msItem.incipit: እጽሕፍ፡ ነገረ፡ ኵሉ፡ መጻሕፍት፡ አውያን፡ ዘ፡ ነቢያት፤ ሮማን፡ ዘ፡ ሐዋርያት፤ ቀንሞስ፡ ዘ፡ ጻድቃን፤ በለስ፡ ዘ፡ ኦሪት፤ ናርዶስ፡ ዘ፡ ወንጌል፤ ሀሊባ፡ ዘ፡ ኃጢአት፤

msItem.title: Lexicon for Proverbs (here called ሰሎሞን፡)
msItem.incipit: እጽሕፍ፡ ነገረ፡ ሰሎሞን፡ ጸንፈርት፡ ዘ፡ ወንቀረብ፤ ጠቃኢ፡ ዘ፡ አውራጅ፤ ምጽንጋዕ፡ ዘ፡ ሐሩር፤

msItem.title: Lexicon for Sirach
msItem.incipit: እጽሕፍ፡ ነገረ፡ ሲራክ፡ ኢታስተአሪ፡ ዘ፡ አታገናኝ፤ ይዜውሩ፡ ዘ፡ ይመላለሳሱ፤ ኢይስሒ፡ ዘ፡ አይለያይም፤

msItem.title: Thematic lexicon for Ezekiel
msItem.incipit: እጽሕፍ፡ ነገረ፡ ሕዝቅኤል፤ እለ፡ ቋጥሩ፡ ዘ፡ ዖፍ፡ ዘራብዕ፡ ርእሱ፤

support.note:
According to the description
297 , the manuscript is made partly of parchment and partly of paper. Basing only on the images, it is difficult to say exactly how the materials are distributed.

extent.note: The size of many folia (especially after ) is smaller and their form is frequently irregular.

supportDesc.foliation: Folia numbers stamped in the bottom right corner, probably of the Institute of Ethiopian Studies.
supportDesc.collation: The number of quires and the quire structure can be discerned only in a part of the volume.

layout.note: The number of written lines varies greatly.
layout.ab: Pricking and ruling are partly visible
The upper line is written above the ruling
The bottom line is written above the ruling

handNote.desc: Careless, hasty; by a person accustomed to writing, but unlikely a professional scribe. Strongly right sloping script.

item.desc: Table with shadow lengths for all months of the year.

Brief note figuratively interpreting what Gospels, faith, Old Testament, and human acts are. Above in the margin, there is a short writing (in a hand different from the main Hand 1) that was interpreted as ownership note mentioning the name of Gʷabaze (see 297 , with in part different interpretation).
Stamp of the Institute of Ethiopian Studies.
Half-erased, hardly readable note, possibly a writing exercise.
Half-erased, unreadable note that was written perpendicularly to the direction of the written lines.
Unclear, hardly readable note, crudely written.
Possibly protective prayer or recipe, erased, hardly readable.
Stamp of the Institute of Ethiopian Studies.
Number 1292, the word ዮኒቬርሲቲ, unclear signature on a white slip of paper glued to the inner side of the back board.
Number 19, abbreviation IES, on a white slip of paper glued to the outer side of the back board.

history.origin: 19th century, somewhat later time cannot be excluded. The manuscript, crudely manufactured, was probably copied by a traditional scholar for his own use.
history.provenance: The manuscript might have been in possession of Gʷabaze.

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.

revisionDesc.change: Created minimal record with link from data sent from Daniel Gullo, HMML project.
Revised the description using the digital images online.
